body: Hi Stefania, Hi Abraham Stefania, can you post the file here? The problem is something like this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5E78cygXwe0hlra9kDpNwDZ3uCYz-d0u8ql19Ip5*Rs7bnpyYeAvZy1wugTXUuTM6z-3tpIMAd1DP5ymcNj0Pu4-F5mDj3hA/upper_error.png) Probably, some Boolean variables in your component have the "uppercase function". Best  Antonello
